page.title: 18COMMUNITY LIFE:BERE FERRERS
page.content: The community life tends to be very strong but of,necessity,inward looking. The population is 300 of which 100 are children.About 30 organisations meet in either the Church Hall or the Social Club which is open every evening and also used in the day by a Playgroup and even a mens hairdresser.The publican who is leaving the well-kept pub,said that the village people rarely use it. To date about Â£30000 has been raised by the village for the Church Restoration Appeal and many activities are still continuing,on an annual basis.There is an annual water-sports festival(including wind-surfing)which is popular locally.Bere Barton(a castellated manor house with a garde robe and grounds sloping to the river)has a summer fete and several farmers hold a Farm Tea with stalls.
